en-US.title: Optimize resources
en-US.optimizeExpl: You can reduce the file size of your project by running an optimization routine which will remove all unused samples, unused custom wave tables and duplicate / useless instructions from your project. Note that this operation cannot be undone, though the made changes will only become permanent after saving your project.
en-US.removedUnused: Removed {waveTables} unused wave tables, {samples} unused samples and {instructions} duplicate / useless instructions.
